Parameters: A non-null instance of a StreetViewPanorama associated with the @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaFragment_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaView_E@ that defines the callback.
onStreetViewPanoramaReady(com.google.and.Description: Called when the Street View panorama is ready to be used.

ClassDesc: Callback interface for when the Street View panorama is ready to be used. Once an instance of this interface is set on a @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaFragment_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanoramaView_E@ object, the @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#OnStreetViewPanoramaReadyCallback#onStreetViewPanoramaReady_E@ method is triggered when the panorama is ready to be used and provides a non-null instance of @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#StreetViewPanorama_E@. If Google Play services is not installed on the device, the user will be prompted to install it, and the @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#OnStreetViewPanoramaReadyCallback#onStreetViewPanoramaReady_E@ method will only be triggered when the user has installed it and returned to the app.
